subject: Soccer
Algarve Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Alex Morgan scored her first career hat trick and Abby Wambach added her 134th goal, leading the United States over Sweden, 4-0, in the third-place match of the Algarve Cup in Parchal, Portugal.
snippet: Alex Morgan scored her first career hat trick and Abby Wambach added her 134th goal, leading the United States over Sweden, 4-0, in the third-place match of the Algarve Cup in Parchal, Portugal.
